attributes.action: allow us to feedback our satisfaction or lack of satisfaction to No 10 petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a response is received to a petition, often as citizens we may wish to show appreciation or dismay to the answer. Sometimes we may feel that a question has not been fully answered or has unintentionally missed the point. We the undersigned feel that a conversation with the prime minister can not be one way, and wish facilities to enable a clearer more satisfying interaction, at the end of the petition process.

rejection.details: There are a number of ways you can contact Downing Street to provide feedback about petitions. Please visit http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us for more information.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
